# Projects // 有趣项目

**DiffEdit Implementation**

- Implemented DiffEdit paper from scratch, building a complete text-based image editing pipeline with Stable Diffusion
- Successfully generated segmentation masks and identified VAE compression artifacts in latent space
- [Read more](forblog/posts/15_un_successfully_implementing_diffedit.ipynb)

**PyTorch Reimplementation**

- Reimplemented PyTorch core neural network components from scratch (layers, backpropagation, autograd, optimizers, dataloaders)
- Progressively rebuilt with PyTorch to understand modular architecture
- [Read more](forblog/posts/20_models_from_scratch.ipynb)

**Stable Diffusion Implementation**

- Built custom Stable Diffusion pipeline from components (CLIP, U-Net, VAE)
- Implemented classifier-free guidance and negative prompts
- [Read more](forblog/posts/13_implementing_stable_diffusion_from_its_components.html)

**Backpropagation Tutorial**

- Authored technical blog post deriving backpropagation from first principles using plain language
- [Read more](forblog/posts/18_backprop_from_scratch.qmd)

**GPU Algorithm Optimization**

- Optimized Meanshift clustering algorithm achieving 6x speedup (1.5s → 0.25s) through batch processing and other GPU acceleration techniques
- [Read more](forblog/posts/17_meanshift_clustering.html)
